summary: Completed comprehensive testing of XSELL Orçamentos module with new features including personalization, frete/despesas repasse, dias cobrar resposta, and visual cobrança indicators. Backend API functionality is 93.8% successful, frontend UI is fully functional with all new features working correctly.

calculation_bugs.issue: Personalization value calculation discrepancy in total calculations
calculation_bugs.impact: Expected final value 575.0 but got 595.0 (20.0 difference) when creating orçamento with personalization
calculation_bugs.details: Both creation and update calculations show consistent 20.0 difference, suggesting personalization values may be double-counted in backend calculations

passed_tests: ✅ Create orçamento with automatic numbering (ORC-2025-XXXX format)
✅ Frete configuration with repasse ao cliente option
✅ Outras despesas configuration with repasse ao cliente option
✅ Visual cobrança indicators (Amanhã badge, color changes)
✅ Status cards showing correct counts (Total, Abertos, Convertidos, Pend Cobrança)
✅ Orçamentos list with proper status badges
✅ View orçamento dialog with all details
✅ Email notification system for expense due dates
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix backend calculation logic for personalization values in orçamento totals. The calculations show a consistent 20.0 difference between expected and actual values, suggesting personalization amounts may be double-counted in the valor_final calculation.
